text: Jacob Needleman (October 6, 1934 - November 28, 2022) was an American philosopher, author, and religious scholar. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania."Bio: Jacob Needleman", website He was a professor of philosophy at San Francisco State University Department of Philosophy - Jacob NeedlemanThe Essential Marcus Aurelius Jacob Needleman, John P. Piazza - 2008 - Page 111 and was said to have "popularized the term 'new religious movements'." Needleman died on November 28, 2022 in Oakland, California at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * Sun Magazine article * SF Gate article Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Educators from San Francisco Category:American philosophers Category:American translators Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:Writers from San Francisco Category:Educators from Philadelphia
